text: Living Travelz is an international, 24-hour Travel and Traveling television channel based in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. It is a part of the Living Entertainment brand of channels, which is owned by Zee Entertainment Enterprises Limited (ZEEL). The channel airs shows hosted by chefs and anchors like Rocky Singh, Mayur Sharma, Ranveer Brar, Gautam Mehrishi, Vicky Ratnani, Kunal Kapur, Rakhee Vaswani, Ajay Chopra, Maria Goretti and Pankaj Bhadouria. ==Programming== * Ranveer's Cafe: Ranveer Brar showcases international recipes with an Indian twist along with live musical performances by guests. [2] * Chef on Wheels: Gautam Mehrishi goes on a road trip to find out where our fruits and vegetables originate and meets the people behind it. [3] * Pickle Nation: Chef Kunal Kapur travels across India chronicling the different kinds of pickles and their preparation methods. [4] * Food Xpress: TV anchors Rocky and Mayur go on a culinary journey around India. [5] * Kitchen Magic: Professional chef Gautam Mehrishi experiments with common recipes and shares techniques that can be used at home. [6] * I Love Cooking: Former MTV India VJ Maria Goretti gives her own personal touch to traditional recipes and dishes. [7] * The Great Indian Rasoi: Chef Ranveer Brar’s show features long lost recipes and hidden secrets in traditional Indian kitchens. [8] * Vickypedia – Chef Vicky Ratnani takes viewers on a tour of recipes from across the world. [9] * Just Like That with Pankaj Bhadouria * Health bhi taste bhi with Chef Ranveer Brar *India's best cooking * Utsav Thalis of India Kunal Kapur's show where he travels to various places of India and shows the traditional food plates. * Dream Kitchen Pankaj Bhadouria's show where she shares simple kitchen hacks and tricks to make cooking process easier and fun. * Food Memoirs Hemant Oberoi is a new show where chef shares his experience of cooking for various celebrities and his days at Taj Hotel, Mumbai. * 100% Veg Gautam Mehrishi shares vegetarian dishes. ==See also== * Living Foodz * Zee Network * Zee TV * Zee Living * Zee Zest ==References== #http://www.business- standard.com/article/management/essel-launches-living- foodz-115090301284_1.html #https://web.archive.org/web/20160910190628/http://www.televisionpost.com/television/living- foodz-to-launch-ranveers-cafe-on-20-oct/ #http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-venture-on-a-road-trip-with- chef-mehrishi-on-chef-on-wheels-only-on-living-foodz-2124481 #http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/food/food-features/Pickle- making-epitome-of-culinary-strength-Chef-Kunal-Kapur/articleshow/48943225.cms #http://www.dnaindia.com/india/report-rocky-mayur-take-you-on-food-xpress-on- living-foodz-2124121 #http://www.televisionpost.com/press-releases/living- foodz-blends-art-and-science-of-cooking-in-new-show-kitchen-magic/ #http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health- news/Maria-Goretti-talks-about-healthy-eating-habits-for- kids/articleshow/50575856.cms #http://indianexpress.com/article/cities/chandigarh/cooking-healthy-cooking- not-distant-terms/ #http://www.tellychakkar.com/tv/releases/living-foodz- presents-vickypedia-150924 Category:Zee Entertainment Enterprises Category:Essel Group Category:Indian cuisine Category:Television networks in India Category:Food and drink television Category:Television channels and stations established in 2018
title: Living Travelz
